mdRecord.dcterms:title: Memo to the Session of College Church
mdRecord.dcterms:description: June 28, 1964 Memo to the Session of College Church from Arthur M. Field, Jr. / "In response to unceasing pressure of many types and from many sources, I have decided to request the bi-racial worship and study group, which developed out of the Presbyterian Doctrine Study Group, not to meet again in College Church."
mdRecord.dcterms:creator: Arthur M. Field, Jr.
mdRecord.dcterms:subject: United States--Race Relations
Civil Rights Movements--United States
School Integration--Massive Resistance Movement--Southern States
Prince Edward County Free School Association (Va.)
Prince Edward County (Va.)
